summary: A man is offered $10,000 a day to survive in a room for 100 days with the chance to become a millionaire. Throughout the challenge, he gradually sacrifices items in the room for money, contemplates leaving, but ultimately proposes to his girlfriend and decides to exit the room after making $340,000.
